external_references.description: Sherstobitoff, R. (2018, March 02). McAfee Uncovers Operation Honeybee, a Malicious Document Campaign Targeting Humanitarian Aid Groups. Retrieved May 16, 2018.
Sherstobitoff, R. (2018, March 02). McAfee Uncovers Operation Honeybee, a Malicious Document Campaign Targeting Humanitarian Aid Groups. Retrieved May 16, 2018.

objects.description: Several commands are supported by the [Honeybee](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0072)'s implant via the command-line interface and there’s also a utility to execute any custom command on an infected endpoint.(Citation: McAfee Honeybee) [Honeybee](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0072) used batch scripting.(Citation: McAfee Honeybee)
